## New Susie Results
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ldmap)
library(ggplot2)
library(DT)
susie_df <- readRDS("output/new_susie.RDS") 


susie_df %>% 
  mutate(snp=as.character(snp),
         anno=map_chr(anno,paste0,collapse=","),
         tag_snp=as.character(tag_snp),
         ldmr=as.character(ldmr)) %>% 
    select(SNP=snp,
           `Genomic Features`=anno,
           `Tag SNP`=tag_snp,
           `p-value`=pval,
           Prior=prior,
           PIP=pip,
           Locus=ldmr,
           `Uniform PIP`=uniform_pip,
           `Nearest Gene`=symbol,
           `Distance To Gene`=gene_dist) %>% 
           DT::datatable()
```
